sentences.en: a genetic predisposition to liver disease
Familial aggregation of POAG patients suggests that genetic factor plays a vital role in POAG predisposition.
sentences.cn: 研究表明原发性开角型青光眼有明显的家族聚集性,即遗传因素在发病中扮演重要角色.

sentences.en: For light brown or dark brown spots scattered in many symmetric distribution, with a genetic predisposition.
sentences.cn: 为淡褐色或深褐色斑点,多散在对称分布, 具有遗传倾向.

sentences.en: Genetic predisposition is by far the most common cause of baldness.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止,遗传因素是造成秃顶的最主要原因.

sentences.en: Genetic predisposition seems to be part of the answer, at least in some people.
sentences.cn: 有一部份的答案与遗传体质有关, 至少对一些患者来说是如此.

sentences.en: However, there is increasingly strong evidence of a genetic predisposition to scleroderma.
sentences.cn: 然而, 存在硬皮病遗传因素的日益增长的证据.

sentences.en: It's also possible, he said, that those who died had an underlying genetic predisposition or condition.
sentences.cn: 这也是可能的, 他说, 那些死去的人有一种潜在的遗传的易患病体质或状态.

sentences.en: Members of the house who show a predisposition for illusion are often trained as phantasmists.
sentences.cn: 因为幻觉看起来体弱多病的家族成员经常被训练为幻术师.

sentences.en: Nei larger than 5 millimeters are congenital nei and are most probably associated with genetic predisposition.
sentences.cn: 大于5毫米的痣大多为先天性的,很有可能与遗传倾向有关.

sentences.en: On their predisposition to the possibility of it working.
sentences.cn: 因为他们觉得有可能性所以才有效.

sentences.en: One's color predisposition is associated with one's nature from birth.
sentences.cn: 你的色彩倾向与你天生的本性有相关.

sentences.en: Shared biologic predisposition may also play a major role.
sentences.cn: 生物遗传易感性也起了重要作用.

sentences.en: The birth predisposition hologram that determines personality and life dance also has restrictions upon it.
sentences.cn: 决定人格及人生之舞的出生预设全息图也具有限制.

sentences.en: There is a thin dividing line between educating the public and creating a predisposition to panic.
sentences.cn: 教育公众和营造恐慌倾向之间只有细小的区别。

sentences.en: This might indicate a predisposition to elevated mood and mania, they speculate.
sentences.cn: 他们推测这可能表示易于情绪高涨或躁狂的体质.

sentences.en: This predisposition may bespeak a different mentality.
sentences.cn: 这种偏爱可能说明不同的心智状态.

trans.tran_en: a tendency to behave in a particular way or suffer from a particular illness
